# bounds

**Instance Property**

The rectangle that holds discovered feature.

## Declaration

```swift
var bounds: CGRect { get }
```

## Discussion

The rectangle is in the coordinate system of the image.

## Feature Properties

- **type**: The type of feature that was discovered.
